actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of years Representatives and Senators may serve.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment -- Amends the Constitution of the United States to limit to 18 the number of years U.S. Representatives and Senators may serve, excluding service to fill a vacancy.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of years Representatives and Senators may serve.
